term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - lot in analytical chemistry
term.title: lot

item.text: A quantity of material which is assumed to be a single population for sampling purposes.

sources.item: PAC, 1988, 60, 1461. 'Nomenclature, symbols, units and their usage in spectrochemical analysis-X. Preparation of materials for analytical atomic spectroscopy and other related techniques (Recommendations 1988)' on page 1463 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198860091461)
